overview:
Founding partner and main shareholder of Grupo Intercom. Participant of PADE a senior management programme at the IESE business school.

Antonioâ€™s activity on the internet began with the creation of Intercom in 1995. Since then, he has successfully promoted more than 20 online businesses in very different areas, giving him a particularly broad, in-depth view of the sector.
